com.dlsc.flexgantt.model.scheduling

Class SimpleGranularityConstraint<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dlsc.flexgantt.model.gantt.DefaultRelationship<T>
      • com.dlsc.flexgantt.model.scheduling.AbstractConstraint<T,SimpleGranularity>
        • com.dlsc.flexgantt.model.scheduling.SimpleGranularityConstraint<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the timeline objects
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRelationship<T>, IConstraint<T,SimpleGranularity>

    public class SimpleGranularityConstraint<T>
extends AbstractConstraint<T,SimpleGranularity>
    A constraint that can be used when the SimpleGranularity type is used in the dateline of the Gantt chart.
    Since:
    2.1
    Author:
    Dirk Lemmermann

        Constructs a new constraint.
        Parameters:
        sourcePath - the path to the source timeline object (timeline object 1)

        Constructs a new constraint.
        Parameters:
        sourcePath - the path to the source timeline object (timeline object 1)
        targetPath - the path to the target timeline object (timeline object 2)
        type - the relationship type (S-S, S-E, E-S, E-E)
        Since:
        2.1

    • Method Detail

      • getDelta

        protected double getDelta(long time1,
                          long time2,
                          SimpleGranularity granularity)
        Calculates the delta between the two given time points. If the given granularity is HUNDREDS, then the delta will be returned in HUNDREDS as well.
        Specified by:
        getDelta in class AbstractConstraint<T,SimpleGranularity>
        Parameters:
        time1 - the relevant time point of the first timeline object (might be start or end time)
        time2 - the relevant time point of the second timeline object (might be start or end time)
        granularity - the time granularity (e.g. HOURS, DAYS, ...)
        Returns:
        the difference between s and e
        Since:
        2.1
